note.p: Birth: London, England (31 March or 31 October 1870)
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1939-1941 vol 3 pp 291-324, plate, by Charles S Gibson
References: Sir Harold Hartley and D C Martin, 'The Royal Society Club Dinner on 14 November 1968 in Celebration of the 90th Birthday of Sir Harold Hartley, FRS' in NR 1969 vol 24 pp 146-155
W van der Kloot, 'April 1915: Five Future Nobel Prize-Winners Inaugurate Weapons Of Mass Destruction And The Academic-Industrial-Military Complex' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 149-160
Notes: DSB gives birth date as 31 October 1870
